recommendations: Anagha Somanakoppa “A good boss always helps in personal growth. The importance of a good & understanding boss can never be underestimated. I have worked with various people in my working experience but Niket is someone I can count on. He is young but mature and most importantly a good human being that makes me feel grateful that I got an opportunity to work with him. His visions always motivate people. A down to earth person who is easily approachable & an example of how a leader should be.”

Vineet Singh Hukmani “Niket is a young ambitious leader on a mission. He has a refreshing outlook in an otherwise staid publishing world of business. He loves disruptive innovation and that helps him ride new age digital business opportunity, all the while, keeping one leg firmly planted in the offline world. He leads a team of responsive, bright and honest professionals at his company - The Write Order. His values of integrity and transparency reflect in his team members. From embarking on acquisitions to continually exploring revenue opportunities in the IPR space, he is growing the valuation of his company every day. Keep up the energy and hunger Niket. You have many more mountains to climb and many more flags to hoist. I have no doubt you will emerge victorious through your own differentiated path! Happy to have my first book + album ‘NINE’ in your able hands. ”

organizations.title: The Write Order
organizations.description: The Write Order is an organization which focusses solely on high-quality book printing and making the process from manuscript submission to publishing, to distribution fast and easy. We conduct large-scale writing competitions and give the selected writers a platform to publish their works. The first anthology was published in November and was sold out within seven days. We'll start pulishing individual writers and we're looking for good talent to publish and create a name in the writing space of India! So if you're a writer or you know a writer, send them to us. We'll take care of the rest.
